title: Koi To Arashi To Hanadokei - Heat No Kuni No Alice - Wonderful Twin World
alternative_title: 恋と嵐と花時計 ハートの国のアリス~Wonderful Twin World~ ; Alice in Twin World: Love, Storms, and Flower Clocks ; Love, Storms, and Flower Clocks: Alice in the Country of Hearts ~ Wonderful Twin World ~
status: 恋と嵐と花時計 ハートの国のアリス~Wonderful Twin World~ ; Alice in Twin World: Love, Storms, and Flower Clocks ; Love, Storms, and Flower Clocks: Alice in the Country of Hearts ~ Wonderful Twin World ~
description:
Description :
        A sequel/spinoff of the Alice in the Country of Hearts manga. It’s happy ever after for Julius and Alice who are now lovers. But married life with the morose, antisocial workaholic Clockmaker is not without its problems. Now a “crazy storm” that is said to change everyone it touches is about to arrive. What further adventures are in store for Alice Liddell in this strange Wonderland?
